original_title: Red Hot Chili Peppers - Live in Milan
overview: The Red Hot Chili Peppers recorded live in Milan for MTV's "Live" program.  The Alcatraz, Milan, Italy April 24, 2006 HDTV Broadcast  Contents:  - Can't Stop - Charlie - Tell Me Baby - Dani California - For Emily, Wherever I May Find Her  - Scar Tissue - Me And My Friends - By The Way - Give It Away
title: Red Hot Chili Peppers - Live in Milan
